articles.title: DeMaryius Thomas died of seizure disorder complications, according to autopsy report

articles.title: Miguel Cabrera of Detroit Tigers clarifies stance on future, says he'll return next season as initially planned
articles.description: Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera told The Detroit News that he will indeed return for a 21st major league season in 2023, a day after comments he made raised some doubt that he'd retire before then.
articles.content:
